Full Description: Specular is an app that enables visually impaired people to see through the world's eyes. Visually impaired people (VIPs) constantly strive to independently complete their particular daily tasks. However, there are still times during the day when a VIP really needs a pair of sighted eyes to accompany them during their task, be it big or small. Whether it’s to count money, check clothing stains, or even read expiration dates on food packages. Specular is now the answer.
